title: Skills in Demand
summary: This page provides information about the Subclass 482 Skills in Demand visa. It outlines that the visa allows employers to sponsor skilled overseas workers when suitably skilled Australians are not available. The content includes a brief description and the basic eligibility criteria applicants must meet.

structured_data.description: This temporary visa lets an employer sponsor a suitably skilled worker to fill a position they canâ€™t find a suitably skilled Australian to fill.

basic_eligibility_requirements: Be nominated for a skilled position by an approved sponsor
Have the right skills to do the job
Meet the relevant English language requirements
